title: Launcher Not Fully Loading

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: I've tried running the launcher as admin. Any other tips? Pressing play does nothing

replies.body: Looking at the screenshot, it looks like your network is having problems communicating with our services.  Specifically, I see you're having issues connecting to PVP.net (no friends list) and the patching servers (Can't tap Play).  My suggestion here would be to go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions.
Tried to fix my connection and it didn't work, but I just did a clean reinstall and it worked!
